gems.title: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs (SICP)
gems.description: The Wizard Book. A fundamental textbook on computer programming from MIT.

gems.title: The Computer Chronicles (1983-2002)
gems.description: A golden window into the history of personal computing. See the launch of the Mac, Windows 1.0, and the Internet.

gems.title: UNIX Programmer's Manual (1979)
gems.description: The original v7 UNIX manual. A masterclass in technical writing and system design.

gems.title: Hackers: Heroes of the Computer Revolution
gems.description: Steven Levy's classic book about the early culture of hackers at MIT and beyond.

gems.title: SimCity (1989)
gems.description: Play the original SimCity directly in your browser via DOSBox emulation.

gems.title: Xerox Alto Operating System
gems.description: Experience the GUI that inspired Macintosh and Windows.
